fields.name: Busy Mind (Passive):
fields.value:
Immune to ~~occupy~~ roleblock and redirect.
- Passive kept on class change.

fields.name: Sinister Echoes (Day, 2 Uses):
fields.value:
Make it look like a player says something. They will not see the message.
- Code of conduct applies!

fields.name: Private Matter (Day, 2 Uses):
fields.value: The public will be completely unaware of whispers to and from you for the rest of the day.

fields.name: Mental Blur (Night, 2 Uses):
fields.value: Begin to melt a player's brain, completely erasing their chat history.

fields.name: Mind Warp (Night):
fields.value: Target player will receive framed results from using investigative abilities tonight.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Mental Blur will remove chat history permissions.
